attributes.action: Make invocation of Article 50 subject to a vote in the House of Commons
attributes.background: The current legal process allows Article 50 of the EU constitution to be triggered by the Prime Minister of the UK unilaterally. This is too important a decision to be made without a parliamentary mandate and this action should only be taken with a majority vote from UK elected politicians.

rejection.details:
We think the following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133540
